WorkItem.Description:
Predicates producing CAML like the following:
 
   <Where>
         <Eq>
            <FieldRef Name="Modified" />
            <Value Type="DateTime">2007-06-20T02:19:48Z</Value>
         </Eq>
   </Where>
do not take the hh:MM:ss portion into account correctly. SharePoint returns all of the rows for the specified date, regardless of the specified time. Other types for the <Value> tag seem to be ineffective too.
 
Use of the <Now> tag doesn't produce any results when embedded in the <Value> tag.
WorkItem.Summary: DateTime query predicates don't handle hh:MM:ss portion correctly; Now support problem.
